---
title: "Our Blog"
listing:
  contents: 
    - "*.png" # all Quarto docs in the `posts` directory will be included on your listing page
    - "*.jpg"
  type: grid # `grid` or `default` or `table`; each type has its own set of yaml options to include
  template: |
    <div class="quarto-grid-item">
      <img src="{{ file }}" class="img-fluid">
    </div>
  sort: "date desc" # can also sort on more than one field
  categories: true # allows you to sort posts by assigned categories 
---
